name: iAd Producer Project
summary: Learn about .IADPROJ files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: The content created with iAd Producer is distributed through Apple's iAd network within iOS apps. You can create content for different iPhone and iPad screen sizes. The program supports the insertion of text, images, video, and audio and also allows you to apply animations and styles to different objects in your content. iAd Producer was introduced by Apple in 2010.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
